dublinCore.dc:title: HR 1884 ENR: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 206 West Commercial Street in East Rochester, New York, as the “Officer Daryl R. Pierson Memorial Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Fourteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Tuesday, the sixth day of January, two thousand and fifteen
form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 206 West Commercial Street in East Rochester, New York, as the Officer Daryl R. Pierson Memorial Post Office Building.

section.header: Officer Daryl R. Pierson Memorial Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 206 West Commercial Street in East Rochester, New York, shall be known and designated as the Officer Daryl R. Pierson Memorial Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Officer Daryl R. Pierson Memorial Post Office Building.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
